Articles.Content:
Basically When I time warp, but slowly like x10 or x50 sometimes 100x the shadows or the Sun will suddenly, well I don't know how to describe it, but I'll try: They move at like 2 fps....

I have some mods, but Idk how to take a picture of the list. (Im stupid. )

EDIT: I'm using 1.3 btw all the mods are compatible, I checked myself!

Edited June 6, 2017 by Potato3478
Pls Halp D;

Hey,
Pictures can be uploaded by forum by using some online platform that creates a image link. Imgur is a good example. 
Also, you can post your ksplog here for better view whats going on. All the info about that can be found here.

Intended feature unfortunately, not specific to modded installs, implemented in 1.3.

A change to the Suns Dynamics to fix a shadow issue, please see the post linked below and the associated bug tracker ID 15298 in the pre-release bug tracker.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/161388-suns-dynamic-lighting-issue-in-space-center/

Edit: A dev post has been written regarding the lighting/shadows change here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/developerarticles.html/enter-the-shadows-r205/

Edited June 8, 2017 by rob593
Added link to latest information
